title: Page scaffolding, info page, and registration
description:
## Objective

Create the page entry points, layout, info page, and register FO-11 in navigation and overview.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/2026-02-11-fo-11-spec.md — Sections: "File Structure", "Registration"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- app/fo-11/page.tsx
- app/fo-11/layout.tsx
- app/fo-11/fo-11-layout-client.tsx
- app/fo-11/info/page.tsx

**Files to modify:**
- nav.config.ts — Add FO-11 entry
- app/overview/page.tsx — Add FO-11 card and table row

## Implementation

1. Copy app/fo-10/page.tsx to app/fo-11/page.tsx — update import path
2. Copy app/fo-10/layout.tsx to app/fo-11/layout.tsx — rename to Fo11Layout, update client import
3. Copy app/fo-10/fo-10-layout-client.tsx to app/fo-11/fo-11-layout-client.tsx — rename to Fo11LayoutClient, update navTree find to '/fo-11'
4. Create app/fo-11/info/page.tsx using InfoPageWrapper — describe FO-11 as "Guided Discovery Hybrid" with key differences from FO-10 (adaptive questions, skip logic, single-word tone chips)
5. Add FO-11 to nav.config.ts after FO-10 entry:
   { label: "FO-11", href: "/fo-11", children: [{ label: "Demo", href: "/fo-11" }, { label: "Info", href: "/fo-11/info" }] }
6. Add FO-11 to app/overview/page.tsx experiments array and comparison table

## Tests

1. TypeCheck — all files compile
2. Navigation — FO-11 appears in nav menu
3. Page loads — /fo-11 renders the experience

Run: npx tsc --noEmit && npm run build

Do NOT close until tests pass.
